DOC.brief_summary: The specific aim study : 1 ) test effectiveness home-bases intervention improve home safety , fall efficacy functional performance ; 2 ) determine use environmental strategy result occurrence less negative health event ( fall depression ) ; 3 ) compare type environmental strategy accept used different treatment condition ; 4 ) evaluate cost-effectiveness intervention program .
DOC.brief_title: Project ABLE : Advancing Better Living Elders
DOC.criteria: 70 year old community dwell functional vulnerability/HRCA vulnerability index= > 1 problem area MiniMental Status Examination ( MMSE ) score less equal 23 legal blindness bed bound nursing home placement relocation expect within 12 month study eligibility
